FIELD.OBJECT: /** * Evaluate tasks and send ERRORs and WARNINGs to the administrator's email address * * @param {ScheduleContext} context * @param {String} custom email address if you do not want to send the error mail to the administrator */ com.idmedia.translationstudio.firstspirit.api.util.EvaluateLogfileOperation.evaluate(context, "fs5@localhost");
